topic: Daily highlights and results of the 2025 World Athletics Championships in Tokyo.
evaluation: The articles provide continuous, chronological daily coverage of the World Athletics Championships 2025 from September 13th to 21st. They detail key events, results, and athlete performances across various disciplines, offering a comprehensive narrative of the championship's progression. All articles are strictly relevant to the overarching event, requiring no de-noising. The timeline is logical, and the information is highly synthesizable into a full event report.
